test_plotting¶

test_plotting contains tests for plotting functions

test_plotting.test_save_png_altair()[source]¶

Test that that figures saved as png exist.

test_plotting.test_save_html_altair()[source]¶

Test that that figures saved as html exist.

test_plotting.test_save_svg_altair()[source]¶

Test that that figures saved as svg exist.

test_plotting.test_save_altair_exception()[source]¶

Test that function returns exception no format is selected.

test_plotting.test_nesta_theme_activation()[source]¶

Test that the Nesta’s theme is activates by checking the first color of the palette is Nesta’s blue.
